content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]Taste the rays of spring through enticing desserts created by Chef Ana Grgić Tomić, inspired by juicy local strawberries.

 

Treat yourself to extraordinary gourmet creations such as creamy rice with lime and vanilla with caramel and strawberry coulis, taste coconut sponge cake with coconut snow, crispy tart with champagne cream in an eternal combination with fresh strawberries, or tempting dark chocolate crème brulee with pistachio frangipane.

 

Indulge in the French charm of the iconic Zagreb Le Bistro, enjoy its colourful terrace with a view of the city, and toast to spring with the taste of local strawberries and Rosé Kota 260 sparkling wine.

 

  • Strawberry Days at Le Bistro – Menu

 

Book a table:

+385 1 4566 611

lebistro@esplanade.hr

 

*The promotion will last in accordance with availability of fresh domestic strawberries.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
